Flow.description: Adding Case update to run process on the scheduled time Removed the Assignment (Update RunFlowTime And FlowName FirstAttempt & Update FlowToRun and FlowTimeToRun Second Attempt) Updated in S6

formulas.name: formula_2_myRule_15_A1_7099517487
formulas.expression: "This case was opened per the request of " & {!$Record.Requested_By_User__r.FirstName} & " " & {!$Record.Requested_By_User__r.LastName} & "."

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_20
formulas.expression: OR( AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Status}), TEXT({!$Record.Status}) = 'Closed', NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Tracking_Number__c} ) ), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Work_Order__r.Verify_Service_Task__c} , 'SRI')), NOT($Setup.VRBatchSetting__c.IsBatchExecution__c) ), AND( $User.Bypass_Validation__c, ISCHANGED({!$Record.Status}), TEXT({!$Record.Status}) = 'Closed', NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Tracking_Number__c} ) ), NOT($Setup.VRBatchSetting__c.IsBatchExecution__c), {!$Record.Work_Order__c.Vendor_Service_Status__c='Confirmed} Negative' ) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_22
formula_TRUE_myRule_24
formulas.expression: AND(ISNEW() , OR(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Case_Sub_Status__c} ,'Verify Account Number'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Case_Sub_Status__c} ,'Verify Services'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Case_Sub_Status__c} ,'Verify Waste Stream') ))

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_9
formulas.expression: AND( NOT($User.Bypass_Validation__c), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Case_Type__c}, 'New Service'))), AND(OR(ISCHANGED({!$Record.Status}), ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Case_Sub_Status__c} )), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Status}, 'Open'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Case_Sub_Status__c}, 'Pending Service Integration')), AND(OR(ISBLANK({!$Record.Work_Order__c}), ISNULL({!$Record.Work_Order__c} ))), {!$Record.Is_Recreated__c} = FALSE )
